name: ato
info: Data Model needed for ATO use case

enums.name: RangeType
enums.info: List defining range types for segment profile

enumLiterals.name: rtStartEnd
enumLiterals.info: start and ends in a SP

enums.name: TunnelType
enums.info: List defining tunnel types for segment profile

enumLiterals.name: wideCrossSectionTunnel
enumLiterals.info: defines tunnel with more than two tracks

enums.name: CurveRadius
enums.info: List defining different curve radii for segment profile

enums.name: StopLocationTolerance
enums.info: List defining different stop location tolerances for a timing point of type stopping point. Warning: intId differ from SS126 by 1

attrs.name: atoAreas
attrs.info: composes of ATO areas

structs.name: ATOArea
structs.info: Defines ATO Area with collection of ATO segments with boarder of the infra.Area

attrs.name: id
attrs.info: Identity of the object; used for referencing

attrs.name: segments
attrs.info: composes of segments

attrs.name: timingPointsMapping
attrs.info: composes of segments

structs.name: TimingPointMapping
structs.info: main Use-Case map from infra (timetable) to ato (journeyProfile)

attrs.name: infraTimingPoint
attrs.info: refers to infra timing point

attrs.name: atoTimingPoint
attrs.info: refers to ato timing point

structs.name: ATOSegment
structs.info: Defines the topology reference information for a segment profile.

attrs.name: id
attrs.info: Identity of the object; used for referencing

attrs.name: dirTrackEdgeSection
attrs.info: composes of track edge sections

attrs.name: segmentProfile
attrs.info: composes of segment profiles

structs.name: SegmentProfile
structs.info: Defines a segment profile for ATO

attrs.name: nidSP
attrs.info: defines national identifier for the segment profile

attrs.name: segmentProfileLength
attrs.info: the defined range corresponds to the constraints from SS126

attrs.name: version
attrs.info: defines the version of the segment profile

attrs.name: nid_c
attrs.info: defines country identifier for the segment profile

attrs.name: eoaOffset
attrs.info: defines EoA offset for the segment profile

attrs.name: utcOffset
attrs.info: UTC time offset in minutes ; Resolution as defined in SS126 is 15 min

attrs.name: startAltitude
attrs.info: Altitude at the beginning of the SP. Considering ETRS89 as reference. The defined range corresponds to constraints from SS126

attrs.name: atotsContactInfoDir
attrs.info: true if contact info exists fornominal direction ; false if contact info exists for reverse direction ; undefined if no contact info exists

attrs.name: atotsContactInfo
attrs.info: Is onlydefined when 'atotsContactInfoDir' is true or false

attrs.name: staticSpeedProfileStart
attrs.info: composes of static speed profile

attrs.name: staticSpeedProfileChanges
attrs.info: composes of static speed profile changes

attrs.name: gradientStart
attrs.info: Required ATO Resolution is 0.1 permill;positiv: uphill, negative: downhill

attrs.name: gradientChanges
attrs.info: composes of gradient changes

attrs.name: curveStart
attrs.info: defines the curve radius at start of segment profile

attrs.name: curveChanges
attrs.info: composes of curve changes

attrs.name: voltageStart
attrs.info: composes of voltage start

attrs.name: voltageChanges
attrs.info: composes of voltage changes

attrs.name: currentStart
attrs.info: Defined current limitation in Ampere ; Resolution as defined in SS126 = 10A

attrs.name: currentChanges
attrs.info: composes of current limitation changes

attrs.name: baliseGroups
attrs.info: composes of balise groups

attrs.name: timingPoints
attrs.info: composes of timing points

attrs.name: platformAreas
attrs.info: composes of platform areas

attrs.name: tunnels
attrs.info: composes of tunnels

attrs.name: axleLoadSpeedProfiles
attrs.info: composes of axle load speed profiles

attrs.name: unprotectedLXs
attrs.info: composes of unprotected level crossings

attrs.name: permittedBrakingDistances
attrs.info: composes of permitted braking distances

attrs.name: switchOffEddyCurrentBrakeServiceBrakes
attrs.info: composes of switch Off Eddy Current Brake Service Brakes

attrs.name: switchOffEddyCurrentBrakeEmergencyBrakes
attrs.info: composes of switch Off Eddy Emergency Brake Service Brakes

attrs.name: switchOffRegenerativeBrakes
attrs.info: composes of switch Off Regenerative Brakes

attrs.name: switchOffMagneticShoeBrakes
attrs.info: composes of switch Off Magnetic Shoe Brakes

attrs.name: dynamicBrakeForceInhibitions
attrs.info: composes of Dynamic Brake Force Inhibitions

attrs.name: limitedDynamicBrakeForces
attrs.info: composes of Limited Dynamic Brake Forces

structs.name: AtoTSContactInfo
structs.info: Defines the ATO-TS contact information for a segment profile

attrs.name: nidATOTS
attrs.info: defines national identifier for the ATO-TS

attrs.name: nidSP
attrs.info: defines national identifier for the ATO-TS

attrs.name: spNidC
attrs.info: defines country identifier for the segment profile

attrs.name: atotsNidC
attrs.info: defines county identifier for the segment profile

structs.name: StaticSpeedProfileStart
structs.info: Defines the static speed profile for a section of track

attrs.name: speed
attrs.info: Defines the applicable speed for the section of track ; Resolution as defined in SS126 = 5 km/h

attrs.name: specificStaticSpeedProfile
attrs.info: composes of specific static speed profiles

attrs.name: trainEndApplicability
attrs.info: Indicates if a speed limit given for a profile element is to be applied until the front of the train (no train length delay) or the end of the train (train length delay) has left the element.

structs.name: StaticSpeedProfileChange
structs.info: Defines the static speed profile for a section of track

attrs.name: pos
attrs.info: position on the associated segment profile

attrs.name: speed
attrs.info: Defines the applicable speed for the section of track ; Resolution as defined in SS126 = 5 km/h

attrs.name: specificStaticSpeedProfile
attrs.info: composes of specific static speed profiles

attrs.name: trainEndApplicability
attrs.info: Indicates if a speed limit given for a profile element is to be applied until the front of the train (no train length delay) or the end of the train (train length delay) has left the element.

structs.name: AxleLoadSpeedProfile
structs.info: Defines the axle load speed profile for a section of SegmentProfile

attrs.name: segmentSection
attrs.info: composes of segment sections

attrs.name: speed
attrs.info: Defines the applicablespeed for the section of track ; Resolution as defined in SS126 = 5 km/h

attrs.name: trainEndApplicability
attrs.info: Indicates if a speed limit given for a profile element is to be applied until the front of the train (no train length delay) or the end of the train (train length delay) has left the element.

attrs.name: axleLoadCategory
attrs.info: value indicating the suitable Axle load category.

structs.name: GradientChange
structs.info: Defines the gradient at a given location in segment profile

attrs.name: pos
attrs.info: Position on the associated segment profile

attrs.name: gradientValue
attrs.info: Required ATO Resolution is 0.1 permill; positiv: uphill, negative: downhill

structs.name: CurveChange
structs.info: Defines the curve at a given location in segment profile

attrs.name: pos
attrs.info: Position on the associated segment profile

attrs.name: curve
attrs.info: defines curve radius

structs.name: TimingPoint
structs.info: Defines a fixed point on the infrastructure

attrs.name: nidTP
attrs.info: defines national identifier for the timing point

attrs.name: name
attrs.info: User-friendly name, only if different from id

attrs.name: pos
attrs.info: Position on the associated segment profile

attrs.name: stopLocationTolerance
attrs.info: Defines the required stopping tolerance for a Timing Point

attrs.name: stoppingPointReachDistance
attrs.info: Defines the distance from a stopping point to consider it as reached

structs.name: BaliseGroup
structs.info: Defines a technical device group on the railway trackbed

attrs.name: nid_bg
attrs.info: defines national identifier for the balise group

attrs.name: balises
attrs.info: Defines the balises within the balise group

attrs.name: nidCQualifier
attrs.info: true if same NID_C as in segment profile is to be used; false if new country id is to be used for the balise

attrs.name: nid_c
attrs.info: to be defined when countyIdQualifier is false ; defines the new NID_C for the balise group

structs.name: Balise
structs.info: Defines a technical device on the railway trackbed

attrs.name: positionInGroup
attrs.info: Defines the position of a balise in a balise group

attrs.name: pos
attrs.info: Position on the associated segment profile

structs.name: PermittedBrakingDistance
structs.info: Defines the permitted braking distance information for a segment profile

attrs.name: segmentSection
attrs.info: composes for segment sections

attrs.name: distance
attrs.info: defines the permitted braking distance value

attrs.name: byEmergencyBrake
attrs.info: true if Braking is to be achieved using Emergency brake ; false if braking is to be achieved by service brake

attrs.name: gradientValue
attrs.info: defines gradient value to be used for permitted braking distance

structs.name: VoltageStart
structs.info: Defines the power voltage information for a segment profile

attrs.name: voltage
attrs.info: defines the voltage type

attrs.name: nid_c
attrs.info: defines the country identifier for voltage

structs.name: VoltageChange
structs.info: Defines the power voltage information for a segment profile

attrs.name: pos
attrs.info: Position on the associated segment profile

attrs.name: voltage
attrs.info: defines the voltage type

attrs.name: nid_c
attrs.info: defines the country identifier for voltage

structs.name: CurrentChange
structs.info: Defines the current limitation information for a segment profile

attrs.name: pos
attrs.info: Position on the associated segment profile

attrs.name: current
attrs.info: Defined current limitation in Ampere ; Resolution as defined in SS126 = 10A

structs.name: Tunnel
structs.info: Defines the tunnel information for a segment profile

attrs.name: segmentSection
attrs.info: composes of segment sections

attrs.name: tunnelType
attrs.info: defines the tunnel type

structs.name: UnprotectedLX
structs.info: Defines the unprotected LX information for a segment profile

attrs.name: pNominal
attrs.info: Position on the segment profile associated for nominal direction of Segment profile

attrs.name: pReverse
attrs.info: Position on the segment profile associated for reverse direction of Segment profile

structs.name: LimitedDynamicBrakeForce
structs.info: Defines the limited dynamic brake force information for a segment profile

attrs.name: segmentSection
attrs.info: composes of segment sections

attrs.name: dynamicBrakeForceLimit
attrs.info: the defined range corresponds to the constraints from SS126

structs.name: SegmentSection
structs.info: Defines sections with start and end references for use in segment profile

attrs.name: range
attrs.info: defines range type

attrs.name: pStart
attrs.info: Start Position on the segment profile

attrs.name: pEnd
attrs.info: End Position on the segment profile
